name: Arrow Run - For GMTKJam2020
description:
A fast paced action game where you have no direct control of what direction you will be going next.  The arrows dictate your movement, one click removes the first arrow.

Don't touch the edge or you will die!

Controls:

Click to start.

Right-Click to Use a Bomb.

Click to Change Direction.

The Next Arrow Sets Direction.

Bombs C;ear and Reset all arrows.

You Have No Direct Control
